title: Perm Ban for what reason
body: I stopped playing for about 3 months and u banned me again? i posted a forum post about how the a mod said if i didnt play the punishment would downgrade.... wtf?

replies.body: The ban on this account is for toxcity after it went through multiple warnings and punishments. The mod most likely told you the punishments would degrade **following less toxic behavior over a period of time**. If you're not sure about what it was you said that led to this, you're more than welcome to reach out to the player behavior team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), but H&S can't remove or change punishments.
